A minimal OS with automatic updates. Sca: A minimal OS with automatic updates. Scalable and secure.
CoreOS is currently available on multipl: CoreOS is currently available on multiple platforms, with more coming soon.
Everything is supported by a totally fre: Everything is supported by a totally free and open-source Fedora ecosystem.
Open to all current and potential contri: Open to all current and potential contributors on Wednesday 11 AM Eastern on [fedora-meeting{'@'}irc.libera.chat](https://chat.fedoraproject.org/#/room/#meeting:fedoraproject.org).
Our goal is to provide the best containe: Our goal is to provide the best container host to run workloads securely and at scale.
Sign up at [coreos-status@lists.fedorapr: Sign up at [coreos-status{'@'}lists.fedoraproject.org](https://lists.fedoraproject.org/admin/lists/coreos-status.lists.fedoraproject.org/) to receive meeting agendas and minutes.
The Fedora CoreOS image is kept minimal: The Fedora CoreOS image is kept minimal by design.
The Fedora Project envisions a world whe:
The Fedora Project envisions a world where everyone benefits from free and open source software built by inclusive, welcoming, and open-minded communities.

Fedora CoreOS is created by a team in the Fedora community called the CoreOS Working Group. It is comprised of official members who have decision making powers, as well as other contributors. Learn more on the CoreOS Working Group website.
The optimal container host will be offer: The optimal container host will be offered in order to run containerized applications.
There are a wide variety of supported in: There are a wide variety of supported installation methods.
You can view, file, and discuss Fedore C: You can view, file, and discuss Fedore CoreOS issues on the Fedora CoreOS issue tracker.
